Changes from Release 2.0¶

This section addresses the difference between SimPy versions 2.0 and release 2.0.1 in terms of changes and additions.

Bug fixes¶

  • Repaired a number of coding errors in several models in the SimPyModels folder.
  • Repaired SimulationRT.py bug introduced by recoding for the OO API.
  • Repaired errors in sample programs in documents:
    • Simulation with SimPy - In Depth Manual
    • SimPy’s Object Oriented API Manual
    • Simulation With Real Time Synchronization Manual
    • SimPlot Manual
    • Publication-quality Plot Production With Matplotlib Manual

Additions¶

  • Tests for real time behavior (testRT_Behavior.py and testRT_Behavior_OO.py in folder SimPy).
Revision:$Revision: 296 $
Date:$Date: 2009-03-30 14:57:22 +0200 (Mo, 30 Mrz 2009) $
